captions.text:
- Hmm, I think I could
totally rock a mohawk.
I don't wanna get out of the shower.

Holy shit a whole clump
of my hair just came out.
How am I not bald yet?
One day we're just going to not exist.
Oprah is just gonna not exist one day.
I wonder how many naked people
have stood where I'm standing?

Holy shit what if people
have had sex in this shower.

I still have 10 years of
student loans to pay off.
Wait, did I pay them this month?
Wait, which one of these is my loofa?
This is how we do it!
I could totally be a singer,
that wasn't that hard.
Shit I thought...

Did I get a red one? I
had a pink one before.
Why is bread the thing that's bad for you?

The blue one, the blue
one is definitely mine.
What is Shea Butter?
Why am I putting things on my body
that I don't know what they are.
Am I just a drone?
Is soap from the government?

What if Mary Kate and Ashley
are secretly the same person?
That's not impossible...
Oh my god.
What is Beyonce doing right now?
What if she's showering too?

I bet you Beyonce only
showers under waterfalls.
Hmm, wait how long have I been in here?
Sarah?
Can you bring my towel?
Sara?

title: Weird Thoughts You Have In The Shower

comments.text:
My thoughts in the shower:

"What if someone's behind me? *checks* Nope, BUT WHAT IF THERE'S SOMEONE TO 
MY LEFT! *checks* Okay, good...I'm so paranoid..."

"Hmmm...maybe I could develop Marco's (one of my OCs) character...but I 
like the way he is now...hmmm...what if his future children, Eliot, Zach, 
and Scarlet travel through time using the time machine he built because 
they came to present Marco's time period and didn't have any way of getting 
back (yeah, don't ask...)! Speaking of Scarlet, I really need to give her a 
personality...I CAN'T THINK OF ONE! Dang it..."

"Hmmm...what if Marco and Amanda (another OC with the same name as 
me)...wow, I think my subconscious wants me to get a boyfriend...MEH"

"Yeah me, that would be very funny! Wow, I make myself laugh!"

"I'm done! But...the water is so warm! WOAH! Now it's cold! I'm out!"﻿

comments.author: Mabel Pines

comments.text:
My thoughts in the shower:

"Ugh it's too hot"
"Ugh it's too cold"
"Stupid knob, why won't you get the right temperature?"
"Would I get to work on time if I just stood here for twenty minutes?"
"Okay, I've gotten way too used to this lava-hot water, and now I have to 
go even hotter..."
"If my hair keeps falling out in the shower at this rate, I'll probably be 
bald by the time I'm 40."
"Why am I here again? Oh, right, I'm cleaning myself. *grabs shampoo*"
"This shampoo doesn't smell like spring rain. It smells like latex doctor 
gloves. Why do they even call it spring rain if they can't even get the 
scent right? Blast this shampoo company and their false advertising...!"
"Okay, washing my face, washing my face... shut your eyes tight so that no 
shampoo gets in your eyes... OH MY-- THERE'S A MURDERER IN HERE, ISN'T 
THERE? I CAN FEEL IT. Doesn't matter, I'll grab the shampoo bottle and 
squirt it in his eyes. Or I could grab the shower hose and beat the crap 
out of him. Maybe I should act overly excited to see him like Overly 
Attached Girlfriend... just to freak him out."
"These walls are way too thin for me to sing anything without anyone 
hearing me... so I'm not even going to try. Too bad. I like singing."
"Hey, maybe *(insert random celebrity name here)* is waking up right now, 
too. I wonder what he's doing? Maybe he's drinking coffee and having 
breakfast with his family. Once again... I am reminded that he doesn't know 
that I exist. Maybe he's showering at the same time as me, too. DUDE! If he 
found out about that thought you just had about him, he'd totally think you 
were psychotic! Shut up. Just shut up, already."
"I wonder if I will ever just snap and start killing people and go 
psychotic..."
"HOW LONG HAVE I BEEN STANDING IN HERE?"
"Hehe... the ridges in my fingers are so pruny... they're actually really 
funny now that I look at them."
"I can't believe that I cut my own bangs in 3rd grade. Worst picture day 
ever."
"Do I have to shave my legs today?"
"I wonder how much of my life I've wasted just shaving my legs..."
" *Shuts off shower* All clean!"

XD﻿

comments.text:
One time I was singing in the shower because I left Pandora on. So I 
started singing "Wake me Up" by Aloe Blacc. I thought I was alone when my 
dad walked in with NO warning. He was so quiet I didn't notice he was 
there. (He's not a perve he was just using the bathroom.) So when I'm 
putting conditioner in my hair my dad was like, "You sing really pretty. 
You could audition for The Voice." Since I didn't know he was there I was 
like "HOLY SHIT A GHOST!" But then I looked out the shower and saw my dad 
and I was like ".___."﻿
